title: User Request Routing

participants.name: Supervisor
participants.description: The entity responsible for routing the request

participants.name: Agent 1
participants.description: A potential handler of the request

participants.name: Agent 2
participants.description: Another potential handler of the request

participants.name: Agent 3
participants.description: Another potential handler of the request

relations.description: The user sends a request to the Supervisor
The Supervisor routes the request to Agent 1
The Supervisor routes the request to Agent 2
The Supervisor routes the request to Agent 3

description: The User sends a request to the Supervisor.
The Supervisor receives the request and has the option to route it to one of three agents: Agent 1, Agent 2, or Agent 3.
The routing from the Supervisor to the agents is represented by dashed arrows, indicating potential routes.
